schema.title: MQTT Sink options
schema.description: An Astarte Flow sink that publishes MQTT messages.

broker_url.description: The URL of the broker the source will connect to.
broker_url.title: Broker URL

client_id.description: The client id used to connect. Defaults to a random string.
client_id.title: Client ID

ignore_ssl_errors.description: If true, accept invalid certificates (e.g. self-signed) when using SSL.
ignore_ssl_errors.title: Ignore SSL errors

username.description: Username used to authenticate to the broker.
username.title: Username

password.description: Password used to authenticate to the broker.
password.title: Password
